item.title: 早间竞标欧元的美丽时刻
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 中国敦促加拿大 "纠正 "关闭海康威视的错误行为
item.description: 在渥太华以国家安全为由命令中国公司海康威视停止在加拿大的业务后，中国商务部周一敦促加拿大 "立即纠正错误行为"。【原文：China's commerce ministry on Monday urged Canada to "immediately correct its wrongdoings" after Ottawa ordered the Chinese company Hikvision to cease operation in the country, citing national security concerns.】

item.title: 贸易前景乐观，标普 500 指数和纳斯达克指数期货攀升至历史新高
item.description: 周一，由于对美国与其主要合作伙伴的贸易谈判持乐观态度，美国 500 指数和纳斯达克指数触及历史新高，为市场的上涨势头提供了支撑。【原文：Futures tracking the S&P 500 and Nasdaq touched record highs on Monday, as optimism over U.S. trade negotiations with its key partners helped support upward momentum in markets.】

item.title: 受特朗普和需求前景提振，美国能源企业看好新的东北部天然气管道
item.description: 受美国总统唐纳德-特朗普支持能源政策以及对未来几年天然气需求将上升的预期影响，美国能源公司正在寻找新的机会，建设天然气管道，以开发宾夕法尼亚州、俄亥俄州和西弗吉尼亚州的阿巴拉契亚页岩地层。【原文：U.S. energy companies are eying renewed opportunities to build natural gas pipelines to tap in to Appalachia shale formations in Pennsylvania, Ohio and West Virginia, buoyed by U.S. President Donald Trump’s pro-energy policies and expectations that demand for the fuel will rise in coming years.】

item.title: 北约基金支持生物技术初创企业应对生物威胁
item.description: 北约创新基金（NATO Innovation Fund）周一表示，该基金已向一家生物技术公司进行了首次投资，旨在加强对生物威胁的防御能力【原文：The NATO Innovation Fund has made its first investment in a biotechnology company, it said on Monday, seeking to enhance defences against biological threats】

item.title: 美国 NHTSA 对约 92,000 辆捷豹路虎汽车展开调查
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周一表示，已开始对 91,856 辆捷豹路虎汽车的前转向节故障风险进行初步评估。【原文：The U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Monday it has opened a preliminary evaluation into 91,856 Jaguar Land Rover vehicles over the risk of faulty front steering knuckles.】

item.title: 美联储压力测试成功为赔付扫清障碍，美国银行股上涨
item.description: 华尔街最大的银行通过了美联储的年度体检，为数十亿美元的股票回购和分红创造了条件，因此在周一盘前交易中上涨。【原文：Wall Street's biggest banks rose in premarket trading on Monday after sailing through the Federal Reserve's annual health check, setting the stage for billions in stock buybacks and dividends.】

item.title: 特朗普的 "大而美 "法案将进一步玷污国债在海外的光芒
item.description: 随着特朗普政府的 "大而美法案 "在美国参议院顺利通过，外国投资者越来越倾向于从美国国债中分散投资，因为赤字支出和刺激通胀的关税前景会让美国国债失去光泽。【原文：As the Trump administration's "big, beautiful bill" grinds its way through the U.S. Senate, incentives are growing for foreign investors to diversify out of U.S. Treasuries losing sheen from prospects of deficit spending and inflation-boosting tariffs.】

item.title: 英国竞争监督机构开始初步调查波音与 Spirit Aero 航空公司的交易
item.description: 英国竞争监管机构周一表示，已开始对飞机制造商波音公司收购 Spirit Aerosystems 公司的交易进行第一阶段调查，并将作出决定的最后期限定在 8 月 28 日。【原文：Britain's competition regulator said on Monday it has begun a Phase 1 investigation into planemaker Boeing's deal to acquire Spirit Aerosystems and set a deadline of August 28 for a decision.】

item.title: 中国资金推动港股上涨
item.description: 中国投资者受到较低估值和香港在中国与美国日益激烈的竞争中的战略地位的吸引，纷纷涌入港股。【原文：Chinese investors are piling into Hong Kong shares lured by lower valuations and the city's strategic position in China's growing rivalry with the United States.】

item.title: 对冲基金因石油价格下跌而抛售能源股，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）称
item.description: 路透社周一看到的一份高盛（Goldman Sachs）报告显示，由于中东紧张局势缓解导致油价下跌，对冲基金上周以 2024 年 9 月以来最快的速度抛售了能源类股票，抛售速度在过去 10 年中位居第二。【原文：Hedge funds sold energy stocks last week at the fastest pace since September 2024 and at the second-quickest clip in the last 10 years, as oil prices fell on easing Middle East tensions, a Goldman Sachs note seen by Reuters on Monday showed.】

item.title: 瑞士政府称受到健康基金会网络攻击的影响
item.description: 瑞士周一表示，非营利性健康基金会 Radix 遭到网络攻击，数据被窃取和加密，联邦政府也受到影响。【原文：Switzerland said on Monday that a cyberattack on the non-profit health foundation Radix that involved data being stolen and encrypted had also affected the federal administration.】

item.title: 独家报道公司电子邮件显示：日产试图推迟向供应商付款以释放现金
item.description: 据路透社查阅的几封邮件和一份公司文件显示，在这家陷入困境的日本汽车制造商争相增加现金之际，日产汽车要求一些供应商允许其延迟付款，以腾出短期资金。【原文：Nissan Motor has asked some suppliers to allow it to delay payments to free up short-term funds, according to several emails and a company document reviewed by Reuters, as the troubled Japanese automaker scrambles to boost cash.】

item.title: 特斯拉 V4 超级充电站开始在中国运营
item.description: 美国汽车制造商特斯拉周一表示，其首批 V4 超级充电器已开始在中国运营，覆盖上海、重庆、甘肃和浙江四省。【原文：Tesla's first batch of V4 superchargers has begun operation in China, covering Shanghai, Chongqing, Gansu and Zhejiang provinces, the U.S. automaker said on Monday.】

item.title: 美元问题盘旋在辛特拉顶级央行行长会议上空
item.description: 从周一晚上开始，世界顶级央行行长将在葡萄牙辛特拉（Sintra）举行会议，届时，一个百万美元的问题将笼罩在他们的心头：以美国货币为中心的货币体系是否开始瓦解？【原文：A million-dollar question will hang over the world's top central bankers when they meet in Sintra, Portugal, from Monday evening: Is the monetary system centred on the U.S. currency beginning to unravel?】

item.title: 韩国表示寻求延长美国 90 天关税暂停期
item.description: 韩国一位高级贸易官员周一表示，韩国将寻求延长将于下周到期的为期90天的美国关税暂停期，因为首尔和华盛顿之间的谈判很可能会持续到设定的最后期限之后。【原文：South Korea will seek an extension to the 90-day pause in U.S. tariffs that is set to expire next week, as negotiations are likely to continue past the deadline set between Seoul and Washington, a senior South Korean trade official said on Monday.】

item.title: 汤姆汤姆公司（TomTom）将在人工智能转型过程中裁员 300 人
item.description: 荷兰定位技术公司 TomTom 周一表示，将裁员 300 人，以调整组织结构，并将人工智能作为其产品主导战略的一部分。【原文：Dutch location technology company TomTom said on Monday it would cut 300 jobs as it realigns its organization and embraces artificial intelligence as part of its product-led strategy.】

item.title: 投资者涌向欧洲，因为集团的稳定性与对美国的担忧形成鲜明对比
item.description: 彼得-罗斯纳（Peter Roessner）对唐纳德-特朗普贸易战的两面性感同身受。【原文：Peter Roessner is feeling both sides of Donald Trump's trade war.】

item.title: 美国降低英国汽车和飞机零部件关税的协议生效
item.description: 英国政府周一表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与英国首相基尔-斯塔默签署的降低从英国进口商品部分关税的贸易协议已经生效。【原文：The trade deal signed between U.S. President Donald Trump and British Prime Minister Keir Starmer lowering some tariffs on imports from Britain has come into effect, the British government said on Monday.】

item.title: 欧洲 贸易谈判畅通无阻，风险随之流动
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 印尼为美国提供关键矿产联合投资机会，作为关税谈判的一部分
item.description: 印尼高级经济部长周一表示，作为与华盛顿关税谈判的一部分，印尼向美国提供了共同投资一个重要矿产项目的机会【原文：Indonesia has offered the United States the chance to jointly invest in a critical minerals project as part of its tariff negotiations with Washington, its senior economic minister said on Monday】

item.title: 条款书显示，NTT 在数据中心房地产投资信托基金新加坡首次公开募股中寻求高达 8.64 亿美元的投资
item.description: 日本电信巨头 NTT 正寻求在新加坡首次公开募股中为一家数据中心房地产投资信托基金募集约 8.64 亿美元，如果包括一个超额配售权的话。【原文：Japanese telecom giant NTT is seeking to raise roughly $864 million in a Singapore IPO for a data centre REIT if an overallotment option is included, according to a term sheet that marked the start of the bookbuilding process.】

item.title: 泰国财政部长将赴美参加贸易谈判
item.description: 泰国财政部长披差-春哈瓦吉拉（Pichai Chunhavajira）周一表示，他将于当天晚些时候前往美国，参加未来两天举行的贸易谈判。【原文：Thai Finance Minister Pichai Chunhavajira said on Monday that he will travel to the United States later in the day for trade talks to be held over the next two days.】

item.title: 消息人士称，OpenAI 将采用谷歌的人工智能芯片为其产品提供动力
item.description: 此举标志着 OpenAI 首次有意义地使用非英伟达芯片，也表明该公司不再依赖微软的数据中心。【原文：The move signals the first time OpenAI has used non-Nvidia chips meaningfully and shows the company's shift away from relying on Microsoft's data centers.】

item.title: 加拿大取消数字服务税以推进与美国的贸易谈判
item.description: 加拿大财政部在周日的一份声明中表示，加拿大已经取消了数字服务税，以推进与美国的贸易谈判。【原文：Canada has rescinded its digital services tax in a bid to advance trade negotiations with the U.S., Canada's finance ministry said in a statement on Sunday.】

item.title: 中国蚂蚁金服集团 2024 年研发投入 32.6 亿美元
item.description: 中国金融科技公司蚂蚁金服集团周一表示，自2021年以来，该公司已连续四年增加研发（R&D）投资，2024年将达到234.5亿元人民币（32.6亿美元）的历史新高。【原文：Chinese financial technology firm Ant Group said on Monday that it has increased investment in research and development (R&D) for four consecutive years since 2021, reaching a record high of 23.45 billion yuan ($3.26 billion) in 2024.】

item.title: 对美国贸易协议的乐观情绪推动美联储宽松政策押注，美元下跌
item.description: 美元兑欧元周一跌至近四年来的最低点附近，原因是市场对美国贸易协议的乐观情绪增强了对美联储提前降息的押注。【原文：The dollar wallowed near its lowest in nearly four years against the euro on Monday as market optimism over U.S. trade deals bolstered bets for earlier Federal Reserve interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 上半年全球并购交易规模扩大，银行家对巨额交易表现出浓厚兴趣
item.description: 今年上半年的并购活动并不如投资银行家们所期望的那样，但亚洲大宗交易的爆发和美国市场重新恢复的乐观情绪可能会为巨额交易铺平道路。【原文：Mergers and acquisitions during the first half of this year were not what investment bankers had hoped for, but a burst of big deals in Asia and renewed optimism in U.S. markets could be paving the way for megadeals.】

item.title: 欧佩克+供应增加，中东风险缓解，石油价格下跌
item.description: 由于中东地缘政治风险缓解以及欧佩克+8月份再次增产的前景提振了供应前景，周一油价下跌了1%。【原文：Oil prices fell 1% on Monday as an easing of geopolitical risks in the Middle East and the prospect of another OPEC+ output hike in August boosted the supply outlook.】

item.title: 亚洲股市在薪资测试前追随华尔街涨势
item.description: 周一，亚洲股市走强，因为对科技公司似乎无止境的需求使 S&P 500 指数期货再创历史新高。【原文：Asia shares firmed on Monday as seemingly unquenchable demand for technology companies lifted S&P 500 futures to another all-time peak, while the dollar dipped on concerns U.S. jobs data will show enough weakness to justify larger rate cuts.】
